hooks.command: echo "Running security review on code changes"
osascript -e 'display notification \"Claude Code needs attention\" with title \"Development Alert\"'

python3 -c \"import sys, json, re; data = json.load(sys.stdin); cmd = data.get('tool_input', {}).get('command', ''); [sys.exit(2) for pattern in ['rm.*-rf', 'sudo rm', 'chmod 777'] if re.search(pattern, cmd)]\"
if echo \"$TOOL_INPUT\" | grep -E '(src/api|src/components)'; then echo 'Documentation update required for API changes'; fi
